channel.title: My Example Podcast
channel.description: This is an example of a site with podcast feeds
channel.itunes:summary: This is an example of a site with podcast feeds
channel.itunes:author: Author Name
channel.itunes:subtitle: This is an example of a site with podcast feeds

item.title: Second Podcast
item.description: This post is in the podcast category so it will be included in your podcast RSS feeds. (You can see the feed subscribe links at the bottom of the page.)
item.content:encoded:
This post is in the podcast category so it will be included in your podcast RSS feeds. (You can see the feed subscribe links at the bottom of the page.)

It also includes an audio tag so people visiting the blog can play it directly:

Your podcast posts must contain metadata like this:

podcast_link: /audio/my-first-podcast
podcast_duration: "32:04"
podcast_length: {"ogg": 29870091, "mp3": 30785454}

Notice that there is no file extension on the link - it will be added based on the type of feed (ogg or mp3).

Put your audio files inside the audio/ directory and add their details to the podcast metadata.
